page.title: 15Whit Friday Band contest
page.content: Every year on Whit Friday In the village of Saddleworth there is a Band Contest.There are a lot of bands walking round the area. Almost everybody comes out to watch and listen.Some look out of the window to watch. There were lots of people in the contest. There was a big crowd when the bands were playing. There were 58 bands entered but some of them didnt arrive so it finished at ten O'clock instead of midnight. When one of the bands marched onto the ground,lots of people cheered.I think the best band was the Post Office Engineering brass band. the band contest has been running for eight years.
